abstract: As it prepares to exit bankruptcy for the third time, Trump Entertainment Resorts and its casinos will be under the control of Donald Trump and bondholders after a court ruling on Monday.
snippet: As it prepares to exit bankruptcy for the third time, Trump Entertainment Resorts and its casinos will be under the control of Donald Trump and bondholders after a court ruling on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump is hoping the third time will be the charm.

headline.main: Trump and Bondholders Gain Control of Casinos
headline.print_headline: Trump and Bondholders Gain Control of Casinos
